General.Name: Zhejiang Jinsheng New Materials Co
General.Description: Zhejiang Jinsheng New Materials Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells acrylic containers in China and internationally. It offers sets, airless bottles, acrylic cream bottles, PETG jars, PP jars, and air cushion BB cream products. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Jinsheng Packaging Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Zhejiang Jinsheng New Materials Co., Ltd. in 2017. Zhejiang Jinsheng New Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.
